text: I kogato Ibrakhim reche: “Gospodi moĭ, stori go zashtiten grad i khrani s plodovete negovite zhiteli - onezi ot tyakh, koito povyarvakha v Allakh i v Setniya den!”, Toĭ reche: “A koĭto e nevernik, shte go ostavya malko da se ponaslazhdava, posle shte go podkaram kŭm mŭchenieto na Ada. I kolko losha e tazi uchast!”
